title: Product
description: Enables either a TransferableProduct or a NonTransferableProduct to be used in an underlier.

TransferableProduct.description: A TransferableProduct is a type of financial product which can be held or transferred, represented as an Asset with the addition of specific EconomicTerms.

NonTransferableProduct.description: The non-transferable product data type represents a product that can be traded (as part of a TradableProduct) but cannot be transferred to others.
